data.title: 10 parasta hotellia lähellä kohdetta Robert B. Redman Stadium kaupungissa Bloomsburg – Arvostelut, valokuvat ja kartat
meta_keywords: Hotellit lähellä kohdetta Robert B. Redman Stadium
data.meta_description: Tutustu hotelleihin lähellä paikkaa Robert B. Redman Stadium kohteessa Bloomsburg tutkimalla todellisia hotelliarvosteluja, valokuvia ja karttoja. Ilmainen peruutusoikeus valituissa hotelleissa, ei varausmaksuja. Varaa nyt ja hyödynnä erinomaisia tarjouksia Trip.comin kautta!
data.text:
Located in Bloomsburg, The Inn At Turkey Hill is in a rural location, within a 5-minute drive of Bloomsburg University of Pennsylvania and Artspace Gallery. This bed & breakfast is 14.6 mi (23.5 km) from Knoebels Amusement Resort and 2.3 mi (3.7 km) from Susquehanna River. Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless internet access, a fireplace in the lobby, and complimentary use of a nearby fitness facility. Satisfy your appetite at Turkey Hill Brewing Co., one of the bed & breakfast's 2 restaurants. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges. A complimentary continental breakfast is included. Free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 23 guestrooms featuring refrigerators and microwaves. Satellite programming and DVD players are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include coffee/tea makers and irons/ironing boards, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Näytä lisää

After a day of travel, rest and relax at Fairfield Inn and Suites Bloomsburg. Easily access important destinations from our hotel including Bloomsburg University of Pennsylvania, Danville Borough and Geisinger Bloomsburg Hospital. The family entertainment and adventure of Knoebels Amusement Resort is also located near our hotel. After a busy day, retire to our rooms and suites boasting ergonomic workspaces, complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi and Smart TVs with access to popular streaming services. You will also find microwaves and mini refrigerators for all your traveling culinary needs. Every day at our hotel a filling meal of eggs, sausage and fruit await at our complimentary breakfast buffet. Later, work out in our well managed fitness center then cool off with a dip in our indoor pool. At Fairfield Inn and Suites Bloomsburg, you are our number 1 priority. Ask us about The Fairfield 100 percent Guarantee where we promise you will be satisfied or we will make it right. That is our commitment to you.

Näytä lisää

Located in Bloomsburg, Comfort Suites Bloomsburg is connected to a shopping center, a 4-minute drive from Bloomsburg Fairground and 6 minutes from Columbia County Historical Society. This hotel is 13 mi (20.9 km) from Knoebels Amusement Resort and 26.8 mi (43.2 km) from Bucknell University. Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an indoor pool, or other amenities including complimentary wireless internet access and an arcade/game room. Additional amenities at this hotel include a fireplace in the lobby and a vending machine. Grab a bite from the grocery/convenience store serving guests of Comfort Suites Bloomsburg. A complimentary continental breakfast is served on weekdays from 6:00 AM to 9:00 AM and on weekends from 7:00 AM to 10:00 AM. Featured amenities include a business center, express check-out, and a 24-hour front desk. Free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 82 guestrooms featuring refrigerators and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and microwaves, and housekeeping is provided on request.

Näytä lisää

When you stay at Quality Inn Bloomsburg in Bloomsburg, you'll be within a 10-minute drive of Bloomsburg Fairground and Bloomsburg University of Pennsylvania. This hotel is 13.5 mi (21.8 km) from Knoebels Amusement Resort and 26.7 mi (42.9 km) from Bucknell University. Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including complimentary wireless internet access and a fireplace in the lobby. At Quality Inn Bloomsburg, enjoy a satisfying meal at the restaurant. A complimentary continental breakfast is served daily from 6:30 AM to 9:30 AM. Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, a 24-hour front desk, and laundry facilities. Free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 78 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have shower/tub combinations and hair dryers. Conveniences include coffee/tea makers and irons/ironing boards, as well as phones with free local calls.

Näytä lisää

A stay at Relax Inn Bloomsburg places you in the heart of Bloomsburg, a 2-minute drive from Susquehanna River and 5 minutes from Children's Museum. This motel is 14.5 mi (23.3 km) from Knoebels Amusement Resort and 2.9 mi (4.7 km) from Artspace Gallery. Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless internet access and a vending machine. Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, laundry facilities, and a vending machine. Free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 21 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and microwaves. Complimentary wireless internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers are provided. Conveniences include phones with free local calls, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Näytä lisää

Bloomsburg, PA Holiday Inn Express has an Easy off/on at Exit 232 of Interstate 80. Improved conveniences and a fresh new look with dependable service! We offer a warm welcome, friendly helpful staff, deluxe amenities, at an ideal location near to Attractions and Businesses surrounding the Bloomsburg / Columbia County area. Guests value being just minutes from Fun and Adventures at Knoebels Amusement Park (with Free Parking / Free Admission), Worlds End State Park, Rickett's Glen State Park, the Children's Museum, Bloomsburg Fairgrounds, and the downtown National Historic District. One of the finest hotels near Bloomsburg University; we're the ideal place to stay for families. Business guests enjoy our convenient location near to local companies that include Kawneer, Commercial Stainless, The J. M. Smucker Company, Bloomsburg Carpet Industries, Inc, Susquehanna Steam Electric Station, Montour Power Plant as well as Geisinger Medical Center and Bloomsburg Hospital. Stay productive with the free high-speed wireless Internet access and our 24-hour Business Center with fax, copy and print services. Enjoy our Free Express Start breakfast bar, Black Out Shades,New Beds with triple-sheeting for a great night sleep! Indulge in the sparking indoor pool or work out in our well-equipped Fitness Center. Plenty to see and do with nearby; Shopping, Hiking, Boating, Kayaking, Covered Bridges, Festivals, Fair, Shows, Blue's Festival & Seasonal events.

Näytä lisää

A stay at Pine Barn Inn places you in the heart of Danville, steps from Geisinger Medical Center and 3 minutes by foot from Janet Weis Children's Hospital. This hotel is 13.1 mi (21.1 km) from Knoebels Amusement Resort and 0.9 mi (1.5 km) from Columbia Montour Snyder Union. Enjoy recreational amenities such as a 24-hour fitness center and bicycles to rent. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless internet access, wedding services, and a banquet hall. Grab a bite to eat at Pine Barn Inn Restaurant, a restaurant which features a bar/lounge, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Full breakfasts are available daily for a fee. Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 99 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and microwaves. Complimentary wireless internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Näytä lisää

Hampton Inn Danville is nestled in the heart of the picturesque Susquehanna River Valley. Conveniently located off Interstate 80 at Exit 224 in Danville, PA. Our Hampton Inn is located near Geisinger Medical Center, Knoebels Amusement Resort, the Bloomsburg Fairgrounds, and several universities. The Susquehanna River Valley offers a variety of outdoor recreation opportunities! Settle into a contemporary guest room equipped with complimentary Wi-Fi, microwave, refrigerator and well-lit desk . Lie back on the clean and fresh Hampton bed® and watch the 43-inch TV. Hampton Inn guests can also enjoy our indoor heated swimming pool, relax in our hot tub or work out in our fitness center. Start your day with Hampton’s free hot breakfast including changing selections of hot entrees like scrambled eggs, bacon, home fries and western omelettes. If you're in a rush, simply grab one of our free Hampton On the Run® Breakfast Bags, available Monday through Friday, for a quick, healthy meal to go. All stays at the Hampton Inn Danville hotel in Pennsylvania are backed by our 100% Hampton guarantee. We love having you here at the Hampton Inn Danville, Pennsylvania!

Näytä lisää

Find the comforts of home in the picturesque Susquehanna River Valley when you book at the Country Inn and Suites by Radisson, Lewisburg, PA. Located off Highway 15, our hotel sits about five minutes from downtown Lewisburg, home to charming shops, restaurants, and popular attractions like the Lewisburg Childrens Museum and the Little League Museum. We are also just two miles from Bucknell University, 16 miles from Susquehanna University, 11 miles from Clyde Peelings Reptiland, and just under 29 miles from Knoebels Amusement Resort. Find fishing just around the corner at Milton State Park, and browse for unique trinkets at Street of Shops, less than two miles away. To relax, visit our indoor pool or soak in the hot tub. Savor complimentary coffee and cookies beside the fireplace in the inviting lobby. Mornings are delightful with our free hot breakfast featuring our signature waffles. We also offer a fitness center and free WiFi. Guest rooms and suites include microwaves, fridges, and coffeemakers.No Pets Allowed.

Näytä lisää
